scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "CESC User" <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] Supported: timer,resource-priority,replaces Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Allow: INVITE, OPTIONS, INFO, BYE, CANCEL, ACK, PRACK, UPDATE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY CSeq: 1 INVITE Min-SE: 90 User-Agent: TANDBERG/518 (TC6.1.2.eb6d163) Expires: 180 Call-Info: <sip:10.253.66.17:5060>;method="NOTIFY;Event=telephone-event;Duration=500" Session-Expires: 90 P-Asserted-Identity: "CESC User" <sip:2220@10.253.66.17> Remote-Party-ID: "CESC User" <sip:2220@10.253.66.17>;party=calling;screen=yes;privacy=off Supported: ms-early-media,replaces,ms-safe-transfer,ms-conf-invite,histinfo,X-cisco-original-called,plcm-ivr-service-provider,timer,100rel,X-cisco-srtp-fallback,resource-priority,ms-sender X-Plcm-Require: sdp-rtp,sdp-audio,sdp-video-main,sdp-bfcp-udp,sdp-fecc,sdp-video-slides Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
